unnormalised: Interesting transfer window! Mohun Bagan seems to be building a strong squad, reminiscent of the dedication shown in "Chak De! India."  East Bengal also making strategic moves.  Rumours suggest R. Kumar from Chennai City might go for a whopping Rs. 20 Lakhs.  Will these transfers translate to on-field success?  Looking forward to the Durand Cup at Salt Lake Stadium.  The I-League will be exciting this season. Key players should be training at NIS Patiala soon. Hopefully, no injuries hamper the teams’ performance.
